name: Bery the time wizard!
description:
Help Bery, the Time Wizard in the toughest battle of his life by ridding the world of the Slime, lead by the fierce Slime Lord.

Time is off the essence as your wand charges excess energy so release it by firing it against the nasty slime! Killing the Slime Lord will drop potions, which will also help you cool the wand down!

Controls:
Left mouse button - fire your wand.
Right mouse button - slow down time as you charge up a powerful dash.

Credits:
Dragoons - code
Fireskelet - art
Paskausks - sound, music
